text:
[Verse]
Blue sky in the mornin'
Shinin' down so warm
Walkin' in the sunlight
Feel that gentle charm

[Verse 2]
Birds up there a-singin'
Melodies on high
Every little moment
See the clouds go by

[Chorus]
Blue sky days
Oh they never fade
Sunshine rays
Make the shadows sway

[Verse 3]
Children laughin' playin'
In the park nearby
Ice cream's slowly meltin'
Time just seems to fly

[Verse 4]
Kites are in the air
Colors all around
Laughter in the wind
Can you hear the sound

[Chorus]
Blue sky days
Oh they never fade
Sunshine rays
Make the shadows sway
title: Blue Sky Days
